name: Evil Nightmares
description:
The Bell is ringing and there is no escape.
The world is quickly shrouded in darkness and horrifying creatures lurk for Marv.
He must face his fears and find a way out of this nightmare or he will be trapped in hellfire forever.

Gameplay


  • A Survival horror game, manage your resources and try to survive.
  • Exploration and action elements.
  • Solve puzzles to escape this nightmare.
  • Around 45-60 minutes playtime.
